title: iCircuit 1.7 – Design and experiment with circuits
content: iCircuit is the easiest way to design and experiment with circuits. Its advanced simulation engine can handle both analog and digital circuits and features realtime always-on analysis. title: PDF Toolset 2.2.0 – Powerful PDF document toolkit

title: JPEGmini 1.8.7 – Compress JPEGs up to 500% while maintaining the original resolution
content: JPEGmini is a patent-pending photo recompression technology, which significantly reduces the size of photographs without affecting their perceptual quality.
